5246.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|142|640$زَيَّنَّا|We have beautified|148|219|5929$ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا|the nearest heaven|150|221|17109$بِمَصَـٰبِيحَ|with lamps,|108|143|15240$وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا|and We have made them|185|195|11911$رُجُومًا|(as) missiles|101|121|17110$لِّلشَّيَـٰطِينِ‌ۖ|for the devils,|112|132|17111$وَأَعْتَدْنَا|and We have prepared|170|190|3992$لَهُمْ|for them|76|86|98$عَذَابَ|punishment|95|332|1786$ٱلسَّعِيرِ|(of) the Blaze.|116|353|11967$

5247.verse: وَلِلَّذِينَ|And for those who|142|163|17112$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieved|92|133|59$بِرَبِّهِمْ|in their Lord|99|140|5406$عَذَابُ|(is the) punishment|149|190|5574$جَهَنَّمَ‌ۖ|(of) Hell,|78|99|2655$وَبِئْسَ|and wretched is|126|343|1161$ٱلْمَصِيرُ|the destination.|125|342|1162$

5242.verse: Blessed is He in whose hand is dominion, and He is over all things competent -

5243.verse: [He] who created death and life to test you [as to] which of you is best in deed - and He is the Exalted in Might, the Forgiving -

5244.verse: [And] who created seven heavens in layers. You do not see in the creation of the Most Merciful any inconsistency. So return [your] vision [to the sky]; do you see any breaks?

5245.verse: Then return [your] vision twice again. [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.

5246.verse: And We have certainly beautified the nearest heaven with stars and have made [from] them what is thrown at the devils and have prepared for them the punishment of the Blaze.

5247.verse: And for those who disbelieved in their Lord is the punishment of Hell, and wretched is the destination.

5248.verse: When they are thrown into it, they hear from it a [dreadful] inhaling while it boils up.

5249.verse: It almost bursts with rage. Every time a company is thrown into it, its keepers ask them, "Did there not come to you a warner?"

5250.verse: They will say," Yes, a warner had come to us, but we denied and said, 'Allah has not sent down anything. You are not but in great error.'"

5251.verse: And they will say, "If only we had been listening or reasoning, we would not be among the companions of the Blaze."

5252.verse: And they will admit their sin, so [it is] alienation for the companions of the Blaze.

5253.verse: Indeed, those who fear their Lord unseen will have forgiveness and great reward.
